name: SmashRadioNewsNetwork
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Matthew Martillo and the reporters of Smash Radio News Network deliver up-to-the-minute reports on Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. Whenever there is reliable, sourced breaking news regarding Super Smash Bros. speculation, characters, and the like, our team will be there.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
